channel.title: Creative Thursday
channel.description: Looking at Life through rose colored glasses. Join Marisa as she chronicles her journey as an artist going for the life that she wants-- with the hope of inspiring other’s to do the same, artists and non- artists alike.

image.title: Creative Thursdays
image.description: Looking at Life through rose colored glasses. Join Marisa as she chronicles her journey as an artist going for the life that she wants-- with the hope of inspiring other’s to do the same, artists and non- artists alike.

channel.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Looking at Life through rose colored glasses. Join Marisa as she chronicles her journey as an artist going for the life that she wants-- with the hope of inspiring other’s to do the same, artists and non- artists alike.

channel.itunes:keywords: yakk, yakkyakk, yakkyakk.com, creativity, art, imagination, self improvement

item.title: What is Creative Thursday?
item.description: Introducing Creative Thursday. Marisa Haedike's first episode detailing the history of Creative Thursday and some thoughts about getting started in living the life you want.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Is this the life I want for myself?
item.description: This is the question that started Marisa down the journey of living the creative life, and living the life she wants. Are you ready to ask yourself the same the question?
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Nobody's Perfect
item.description: Are you using the idea of perfection, "waiting for everything to be perfect" before you take the next step? Inspired by Marisa's childhood sweater...It's true nobody's perfect.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Be willing to play like a rookie
item.description: Sometimes you just have to be willing to be the new kid on the team.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: 4 points, maybe 5 and 1 question found in a Yoga class
item.description: If you try something you are afraid of, what will happen?
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Creative Thursday Field Trip - David Hockney Portraits
item.description: Join Chanin and Marisa as they visit the David Hockney exhibition at the Los Angeles Museum, LACMA.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com

item.title: Creative Thursday Field Trip - Book Party
item.description: Some thoughts from Nancy and Marisa after they attend a book reading in LA.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Some thoughts from Nancy and Marisa after they attend a book reading in LA.
item.itunes:summary: Some thoughts from Nancy and Marisa after they attend a book reading in LA.

item.title: Life of Reilly
item.description: Inspired by observing the day in the life of "Reilly the Cat". What Pace are you setting for your life? Think about it.
item.itunes:author: marisa.haedike@yakkyakk.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Inspired by observing the day in the life of "Reilly the Cat". What Pace are you setting for your life? Think about it.
